title: Boston Academic Contends Catastrophic AI Anxieties are Overblown and Misdirected
description: Academics at UMass Boston’s Applied Ethics Center have been studying the impact of engagement with AI on people’s understanding of themselves, and Nir Eisikovits particularly believes these catastrophic anxieties are overblown and misdirected. While there are big human problems (not caused by AI, but by humans), they require the attention of policymakers. They have been around for ... Read more

title: Web3 Crypto Project Multichain Hit With $126,000,000 Exploit: PeckShield
description:
A web3 crypto cross-chain protocol has been hacked to the tune of over a hundred million dollars, according to one blockchain watchdog. New data from cybersecurity firm PeckShield reveals that bad actors were able to steal $126 million from the Multichain’s Fantom (FTM) bridge, including crypto assets such as Chainlink (LINK), Wrapped Bitcoin (wBTC), Wrapped […]
